Contact haile village bistro and the queens arms pub
5323 SW 91st Terrace
Gainesville FL, 32608
352-378-0721
Visit Haile Village Bistro & Queens Arms Pub
We’d love to hear from you!
Whether you’re planning a relaxed brunch, a night out with friends, or simply fancy a fresh pint and great conversation, Haile Village Bistro and Queens Arms Pub are ready to welcome you.
Located in the heart of Haile Village, Gainesville, we’re easy to find and even easier to enjoy.
Have a question, want to book a table, or just say hello?
Reach out today — or better yet, come and visit us in person!
FOR ALL ENQUIRIES & RESERVATIONS
CALL: 352-378-0721
EMAIL: HAILEVILLAGEBISTROFL@GMAIL.COM
FOR FOOD PICK UP
CALL: 352-378-0721
OR DROP IN AND ORDER AT THE BAR.
OUR STREET ADDRESS
5323 SW 91st Terrace, Haile Village, Gainesville,
FL 32608
WHAT THREE WORDS
DOCTORS.ADVISE.BROADCASTING

Events at haile village bistro & the queens arms pub Gainesville, fl
5323 SW 91st Terrace
Gainesville FL, 32608
352-378-0721
regular events at the bistro & pub
special events
daily events
Happy hour from 3pm until 7pm EVERYDAY! 50% off all pints, house wines, and well liquors.
Select any pint you’d like from one of our 20 taps.
weekly events
Monday Gourmet Burger Night
Are you a burger enthusiast seeking an elevated dining experience? Look no further than Haile Village Bistro. Every Monday, our beloved eatery transforms into a burger haven, hosting a weekly event dedicated to celebrating America’s iconic dish: Burger Monday. Our Bistro Burger is only $5.99 on Burger Monday … including sides!
Wednesday Trivia Night
Test your knowledge and challenge your friends to a battle of wits every Wednesday. Our trivia nights are filled with a mix of challenging questions, fun trivia categories, and exciting prizes.
Wings Wednesday
Every Wednesday, from 5:00 PM to 9:00 PM, indulge in a wing lover’s dream. For just $3, savor a tantalizing platter of 5 delectable wings.
Whether you prefer them saucy, spicy, or plain, our wings are crispy, juicy, and bursting with flavor. Don’t miss out on this wing-tastic deal!
Friday Fish & Chips
From 5:00 PM to 9:00 PM, indulge in our delicious Fish and Hand-Cut Chips special with $2 off!
Karaoke
Sing your  heart out at Karaoke. Every Thursday night from 7:30 PM, and Saturday’s from 8:00 PM.
Live Music Friday (twice monthly)
Enjoy live music while you enjoy a drink and have some great food. See special events for artist details.
ask us about
Saturday monthly afternoon tea parties (reservation required).
Sunday, monthly Persian nights (reservation required).
Saturday Karaoke
Get up and show us what you’ve got! From 8:00pm
do you have a special event?
Work parties, birthday parties, just for the thrill of it parties…we can host them all! Speak with our general manager about hosting your special event with us.
Dining
Watch Liverpool FC Matches Live
Liverpool FC fans, your matchday home is The Queen’s Arms Pub Gainesville. From Premier League showdowns to Champions League nights, we show all Liverpool FC matches live. No streaming struggles, no small screens — just big matches, big screens, and plenty of Reds atmosphere.
Read More »
August 29, 2025
Dining
Watch Gators Game at The Queen’s Arms Pub Florida
If you’re a student, alumni or, just a diehard local fan in Gainesville, you already know: Florida Gators football isn’t just a sport, it’s a way of life. Game days bring the whole city to life, and there’s no better place to watch Gators game than The Queen’s Arms Pub.
Read More »
August 28, 2025
